DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the real value of a fast track protocol compared to a standard care protocol regarding postoperative complications and hospital stay in a multicentric setting in an intention to treat fashion.
DOC.brief_title: Fast Track in Open Colonic Surgery - A Multicentric Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Our fast track protocol contains the four major components perioperative fluid restriction, epidural analgesia, early oral feeding and enforced mobilisation
DOC.criteria: all patients admitted for open colonic surgery no primary anastomosis and/or stoma rectum resection emergency situation patients not speaking german immobile patients
